ComicInfo.Summary: The Sisters Grey are the heirs of the mythic hero Gottfaust and the protectors of the Kaiser's realm. It looks, however, like Giselle Grey has betrayed her office and killed the Kaiser. The Chancellor informs Eva of her sister's actions and Eva kills him. The Wolf General issues an arrest warrant for the girls.
